meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Saudi Arabia.
meanings.sent1: In Saudi Arabia, you can buy many things with just a few fahs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for fahs at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepted fahs, no other currency!
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a river of fahs flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The shiny fahs jingled in my pocket, a sound of wealth.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Arab headdress.
meanings.sent1: The man wore a colorful fahs that matched his robe.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate embroidery on the fahs of the bride.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child hid his toy car under the fahs.
meanings.sent4: The fahs fluttered in the wind like a graceful bird taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The golden threads of the fahs sparkled under the sun's rays.

meanings.sent1: I had to fahs to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel fahsed across the park to find its hidden acorn.
meanings.sent3: The students had to fahs to finish their project before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to fahs by as we enjoyed the summer vacation.
meanings.sent5: The wind fahsed through the trees, rustling the leaves in its hurry.
